TopicTitle: Suggestion: COM and COL balls should move when players adjust the sliders on wings, control surfaces, etc.

Articles.Content: Not a huge thing: I can close the window each time I guess I have a solution and see the balls get updated.  But as a QOL issue - it would be nice to see the COM and COL balls adjust in real time.
A lot of things to do not seem to adjust in real time. AP/PE values when editing maneuver nodes for example.
This would also be a great learning opportunity in general, to help players get an intuitive feel for what changing a wing's characteristics does to the craft
